backend/main.mo: Main actor defining storage, access control, data models, and state for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, and activity tracking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old ribbit records to the new structure by adding a nullable image field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root React application and setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using bookmark state from a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, navigation, avatar loading, and mobile drawer integration.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout managing header, footer, mobile sidebar drawer, and route outlet.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar component showing navigation links and recent activity with route-aware highlighting and mobile drawer support.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with metadata, counts, avatar, like/share actions, and optional tag/user info.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with a 4:3 frame and uses a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 aspect ratios.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar, handling open state, body scroll lock, and overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond info, stats, moderator profiles, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for pond pages with banner, profile image, info overlay, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, content, optional image, and link to its lily thread.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit post with avatar, content, images, likes, and reply functionality, supporting nested replies and actions via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Renders an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition once loaded, supporting avatar or img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts using data from query hooks with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and dynamic suggestions with query input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown search suggestions component showing trending or suggested terms based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags using shared tag-stat modules and query-driven data.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger for underline-style tab navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Hook managing bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to toggle or modify bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Hook that tracks whether a given CSS media query currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating posts, ribbits, ponds, and related data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom design tokens including colors, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility that formats large numbers into compact strings like 1.2k or 3.4M.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image validation, resizing, and compression utility with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Helpers to validate, normalize, and provide error messages for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API or clipboard fallback with user feedback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Functions to validate, normalize, and error-check alphanumeric tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, Froggy Phrase authentication, and localStorage-based settings backup and restore.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements a per-post cooldown using localStorage timestamps to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing Ribbit's purpose, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create lilies (posts) with text, images, links, tagging, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Provides a form to create new ponds with validation and image upload/compression support.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post creation page.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, post counts, and tabs for posts and comments with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders an individual lily with comments, likes, views, posting ribbits, and image handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, creation date, and leave options.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s lily feed with join functionality, sorting, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading, missing-post handling, and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Renders the tag hub with tabs for top, trending, and newest tags, including loading states and tag list items with stats.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting options, canonical tag redirect logic, and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, pond membership, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, constraints, issues, and feature requirements for fixing ribbit image uploads and blurred backgrounds.
